name: B/W Switch
description:
Made for the Global Game Jam 2022, theme Duality. 

Endless Arcade, dodge projectiles and kill enemies touching them. Following the song, transitions will switch enemies with projectiles so try to survive this increasing bullet hell.


Credits:

Andrea Ancona - Designer

Andrea Teruzzi -  Designer and Programmer

Cristian Gurra - Sound Designer

Marco Marchitelli - Art and Programmer
